title: Fluid Mechanics
description: Concepts of linear and angular deformation, vorticity, and conservation of mass.  Development of Navier-Stokes with solutions: steady and unsteady uniform laminar, vortex, creeping, and potential flow.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CEE 4200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
